node.name: NHS_AandE_Performance_Analysis
node.description: An interactive Power BI dashboard with automated ETL pipeline for analyzing NHS A&E attendance and wait time trends. Built using Python, SQL, Docker, and DAX, it features trust-level breakdowns, yearly/monthly trends, performance KPIs, and dynamic drill-through with storytelling.

node.name: tender-response-generator-GenAI
node.description: ​The Tender Intelligence Assistant is a GenAI-powered tool that enables users to upload tender or RFP PDFs and receive instant, structured answers to natural language questions, with contextual references extracted directly from the documents.

node.name: UK-Regional-Salary-Working-Hours-Analysis-2024
node.description: This project analyzes UK regional salary disparities and working hours using ASHE data.
